name: simple-input-app
description: A simple input app with React, Node.js, tRPC, and PostgreSQL

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:shared"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && concurrently "npm run build:server" "npm run build:client"
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:up && sleep 5 && npm run prisma:migrate
scripts.test: npm run test:shared && npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:shared -- --coverage && npm run test:server -- --coverage && npm run test:client -- --coverage
